name: LD48 - Lucky Lefty Loves Leftovers
description:
Lucky Lefty feels bad for treating Rude Righty like an obstacle in Lucky Lefty Loves Loops. To make up for it, Lucky Lefty has gotten Ratto Ripley to deliver pizza to Rude Righty. Will Rude Righty accept the olive branch?

This game was made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 48. Theme 'Deeper and deeper'.

Controls
A / Left arrow: move left
D / Right arrow: move right
W / Up arrow: jump
S / Down arrow: fast fall
Spacebar: toggle bite
P: pause
R: reset game
Esc: go back to title screen

Code/Music/SFX: TheBookSnail
Art/Consultation/Testing: ElysiaGriffin
